procedure: Step 1: Export work items 2025 con 'pwsh Rules.Vault/scripts/ps/agent-ado-userstory.ps1 -Action ado:userstory.export -WorkItemType All -Query "SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State], [System.CreatedDate], [System.Tags], [System.WorkItemType] FROM WorkItems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND [System.ChangedDate] >= '2025-01-01'"'. Step 2: Filtra con pattern deploy usando script in ADO_EXPORT_GUIDE.md sezione 'Identificare Work Items di Deploy' (pattern: Deploy, Release, Prod, Rilascio in Tags o Title).
Export + filtra per WorkItemType='Deploy' e pattern deploy (vedi ADO_EXPORT_GUIDE.md). Escludi Test Suite, solo deploy PROD.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + Tags contains 'AIR'. Vedi ADO_EXPORT_GUIDE.md sezione deploy identification.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + Tags contains 'IFRS9'.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + Tags contains 'DDT'.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + State='Done'. Mostra solo deploy completati.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + State IN ('New','Business Approved','In Progress'). Mostra deploy in corso.
Export 2025 + filtra Tags/Title contains 'Release'. Include sia Deploy che Test Suite.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + CreatedDate tra 2025-01-01 e 2025-03-31.
Export ultimi 30 giorni + filtra pattern deploy + ordina per CreatedDate DESC + top 10.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + conta items. Mostra count per Type (Deploy vs Test Suite) e per State.
Export 2025 + filtra pattern deploy + raggruppa per mese CreatedDate. Mostra distribuzione temporale.
